name: Escape from Knossos: Together!
description:
Escape From Knossos: Together! is a 2 player cooperative 2d puzzle game where you have to cooperate with the other player in order to solve various enigmas in order to both escape from the prison of Knossos. 

Six months have passed since you and your partner in crime have started elaborating the plans to escape from Knossos, the most secure and impervious prison in the world. Today is finally the day of your great escape, but incredibly you messed up!
You have switched the escape plans with your associate and now the only way to safely leave Knossos is to trust each other and communicate through the walkie talkies in order to save your lives. A timer is set on both of your collar, don't make it expires...

To the players:

Please, when you will recording your gameplay be sure to register your and your partner's voice! It will be fundamental to improve our game. 

Disclaimers:

- The game currently miss the majority of assets and the sound design that are schedule to be released in the next few weeks.

- New enigmas are set to be released in the next future.
